review: Dr. Mihir and you did help us and our daughter so much and made her and us so comfortable that my daughter was next time very much  eager for the appointment. Also thanks Dr. Mihir and you for helping us from 4 yrs for my daughters dental health care.... Thanks a lot...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It was my daughter's First dental visit and she was lill scared about it but Dr. Mihir and Dr. Isha made her So comfortable. Dr. Isha
explained to my daughter step by step what she will be doing also about tools and for what it is been used. She even got to watch her favorite cartoon while having her treatments. Return Gift from doctors. My daughter use to be excited to visit this place. Staff was so co-operative. I would highly recommend for kids. Dr. Mihir and Dr. Isha **** *** **** ********
Thank u
PEDIATRIC SMILES.

review: ********* ****** *** has been very friendly with my kid. They know how to take care of small kid and make it easy for them.

Dr isha is a thorough professional and so good with the kids. She's so friendly and knows well to tackle children. I am grateful for her to get my child's beautiful smile back. Gratitude always. I highly recommend Dr isha as a pedodontist.
